mods.note: This piece is included in a bound volume of sheet music once owned by Miss Nora Gardner, who was a resident of Tennessee. This polka composed for the piano has a cover page that lists it as a part of a compilation of music by the same composer entitled "Dew Drops," third edition. In the top right corner are the words "Nora E. Gardner Columbia, Tenn Dec 8th/60" written in pencil.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
